message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase the product for $9,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,500 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, however, the value of this product to me is quite high. I'm willing to come down slightly to $9,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering the value of the product, I would like to counter with an offer of $8,750.
